Portfolio.content: Welcome to the Portfolio module, one of the largest modules in the template. It supports unlimited categories (like the ones below), each category can host an unlimited amount of projects and each project can have unlimited html text description as well as unlimited photos and/or videos. This gives you the freedom to arrange your portfolio however you feel is better and there is no need to skimp on the number of projects you showcase.

content.title: Web Design Portfolio
content.description: Each Portfolio category can have it's own html text description where you can outline some of the distinguishing features that section of your folio has. You should also note that there is no need for this description text, if none is entered the elements will just rearrange into place and keep the site looking nice (see the other categories for a demo).

item.title: Emersis Quertes v2
item.description:
Each of the unlimited number of portfolio items can host as much html formatted description text as you need, unlimited number of photos and/or videos as well as html descriptions for each of these items. Click on the teaser photo on the right to open up the details.

popup.description:
Item Description (html formatted subtitle)
Each photo/video can have an extensive description text that is of course html formatted. If the text is longer a scrollbar appears, so no limits here ! The description text is not mandatory, if there is no description text entered, then the window will be nicely resized acordingly to acomodate just the photo/video and it will have equal black margins all around.

Item Description (html formatted subtitle)
Each photo/video can have an extensive description text that is of course html formatted. If the text is longer a scrollbar appears, so no limits here ! The description text is not mandatory, if there is no description text entered, then the window will be nicely resized acordingly to acomodate just the photo/video and it will have equal black margins all around.

Item Description (html formatted subtitle)
Each photo/video can have an extensive description text that is of course html formatted. If the text is longer a scrollbar appears, so no limits here ! The description text is not mandatory, if there is no description text entered, then the window will be nicely resized acordingly to acomodate just the photo/video and it will have equal black margins all around.
